ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(if(isNUll(Reported_Cancellation_Date__c),false, Reported_Cancellation_Date__c < Reported_Booking_date__c ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reported cancellation date should be greater than Reported Booking date.
